artefact.alternative_title: Generation, transmission, distribution and supply of electricity licence (England, Scotland & Wales)
artefact.overview: You need a licence to generate, transmit, distribute or supply electricity in England, Scotland and Wales
artefact.will_continue_on: the Office of Gas and Electricity Markets (Ofgem) website
artefact.licence_short_description: Licence to generate, transmit, distribute or supply electricity in England, Scotland and Wales.
artefact.licence_overview: To generate, transmit, distribute or supply electricity you need a licence from the [Office of Gas and Electricity Markets (Ofgem)](http://www.ofgem.gov.uk/Pages/OfgemHome.aspx "Office of Gas and Electricity Markets (Ofgem)"){:rel="external"} in England, Scotland and Wales.
